title: New: Polarsets – Another Place To Hide
body:
Bring back The OC, bring back Summer & Seth, bring back Sandy Cohen and his life lessons that helped shaped my teenage years.

This new track from **Polarsets** is about as Orange County as we’re gonna get. Check out _Another Place To Hide_ below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
